Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/GreaterThan

Syntax Exp1 > Exp2
Types
Exp1 Exp2 Exp1 > Exp2
int int bool
int real bool
real real bool
Description Yields true if the value of Exp1 is numerically greater than the value of Exp2, and false otherwise.
Examples 
rascal>13 > 12
bool: true
rascal>12 > 13
bool: false
rascal>13.5 > 12
bool: true
rascal>12.5 > 13
bool: false
Questions
Question 1.
The type of 16 > 4 is

Question 2.
The type of 4.43825885210780400 > -0.124735139283793600 is

Question 3.
The type of -20 > -4.49491649431357200 is

Question 4.
The type of -8 > -19 is

Question 5. 
-17.38621028779440800 > -19 ==
